class Environment:
    """Message bus with idempotent delivery and artifact indexing."""
    def __init__(self, tracer: Optional[ExecutionTracer] = None):
        self.roles: list = []
        self.history: list = []
        self.tracer = tracer
        self._delivered: Dict[str, set] = {}  # role.name -> set(msg.id)
        self._by_cause: Dict[str, list] = {}  # cause_by -> [Message]

    def add_role(self, role: Role):
        role.env = self
        self.roles.append(role)
        self._delivered.setdefault(role.name, set())
        if self.tracer:
            self.tracer.log("ENV_ADD_ROLE", "Environment", f"Added role {role.name} ({role.profile}) watches={sorted(list(role.watch_causes))}")

    def publish_message(self, message: Message):
        if not getattr(message, "id", None):
            try:
                message.id = str(uuid.uuid4())
            except Exception:
                pass
        # normalize send_to
        if getattr(message, "send_to", None) is None:
            try:
                message.send_to = set(getattr(message, "sent_to", set()) or set())
            except Exception:
                message.send_to = set()
        self.history.append(message)
        cb = getattr(message, "cause_by", "")
        if cb:
            self._by_cause.setdefault(cb, []).append(message)
        if self.tracer:
            preview = (message.content or "")[:140].replace("\n", " ")
            self.tracer.log("ENV_MESSAGE", "Environment", f"Published {cb} from {message.sent_from} -> {list(message.send_to)} preview={preview}")

    def get_latest_artifact(self, cause_name: str) -> Optional[Message]:
        lst = self._by_cause.get(cause_name, [])
        return lst[-1] if lst else None

    def get_messages_for_role(self, role: Role) -> list:
        """Return not-yet-delivered messages relevant to this role (explicit or watch triggers)."""
        out = []
        delivered = self._delivered.setdefault(role.name, set())
        for msg in self.history:
            mid = getattr(msg, "id", None)
            if not mid or mid in delivered:
                continue
            # Skip messages produced by same role
            if getattr(msg, "sent_from", None) == role.name:
                delivered.add(mid)
                continue
            # explicit routing
            targets = getattr(msg, "send_to", None) or getattr(msg, "sent_to", None) or set()
            targeted = False
            if targets:
                if isinstance(targets, (set, list)):
                    targeted = role.name in targets or role.profile in targets or "*" in targets
                else:
                    targeted = (targets == role.name or targets == role.profile)
            watched = getattr(msg, "cause_by", "") in role.watch_causes
            # coder should also respond to UserInput if not explicitly targeted
            user_input = getattr(msg, "cause_by", "") == "UserInput" and "Coder" in role.profile
            if targeted or watched or user_input:
                out.append(msg)
                delivered.add(mid)
        return out


class Team:
    """Orchestrates multi-agent collaboration with deterministic ordering and stable verification termination."""
    def __init__(self, context: Optional[Context] = None, log_file: Optional[str] = None):
        self.context = context or Context()
        self.tracer = ExecutionTracer(log_file)
        self.context.tracer = self.tracer
        self.env = Environment(self.tracer)
        self.idea = ""
        self.investment = 20.0
        # Verification stability
        self._last_digest = None
        self._streak = 0
        self.required_stable_passes = 2

    def hire(self, roles: list):
        for role in roles:
            role.context = self.context
            role.env = self.env
            self.env.add_role(role)

    def invest(self, investment: float):
        self.investment = investment

    def run_project(self, idea: str):
        self.idea = idea
        if self.tracer:
            self.tracer.log("TEAM_START", "Team", f"Starting project: {_preview(idea,160)}")

    async def _safe_act(self, role: Role, msg: Message) -> Message:
        """Call role.act with timeouts and retries; always return a Message to keep pipeline moving."""
        tracer = self.tracer
        attempts = 0
        last_err = None
        max_attempts = 2
        while attempts < max_attempts:
            attempts += 1
            try:
                if tracer:
                    tracer.log("ROLE_CALL", role.name, f"Attempt {attempts} for msg={getattr(msg,'id',None)}")
                coro = role.act(msg)
                resp = await asyncio.wait_for(coro, timeout=45.0)
                if resp is None:
                    # role had nothing to do
                    return None
                return resp
            except asyncio.TimeoutError:
                last_err = "timeout"
                if tracer:
                    tracer.log("ROLE_TIMEOUT", role.name, f"Timeout on attempt {attempts}")
            except Exception as e:
                last_err = str(e)
                if tracer:
                    tracer.log("ROLE_EXCEPTION", role.name, f"{_preview(last_err,200)}")
            await asyncio.sleep(0.1 * attempts)
        # All attempts failed, return an error message artifact
        if tracer:
            tracer.log("ROLE_FAIL", role.name, f"Failed after {max_attempts} attempts: {last_err}")
        return Message(content=f"ERROR: role {role.name} failed after retries: {last_err}", role=role.profile, cause_by="RoleFailure", sent_from=role.name, send_to={"SimpleCoder"})

    async def run(self, n_round: int = 4):
        self.tracer.log("TEAM_RUN", "Team", f"Running up to {n_round} rounds (required_stable_passes={self.required_stable_passes})")
        # initial message targeted to coders
        coder_names = {r.name for r in self.env.roles if isinstance(r, SimpleCoder)} or {"Alice", "SimpleCoder"}
        initial = Message(content=f"Let's work on this project: {self.idea}",
                          instruct_content=self.idea,
                          role="Human",
                          sent_from="User",
                          cause_by="UserInput",
                          send_to=coder_names)
        self.env.publish_message(initial)

        # Deterministic role processing order
        order = [SimpleCoder, SimpleTester, SimpleReviewer, SimpleVerifier]
        for round_idx in range(1, n_round + 1):
            self.tracer.log("ROUND_START", "Team", f"Round {round_idx}/{n_round}")
            progress_made = False

            for RoleType in order:
                roles = [r for r in self.env.roles if isinstance(r, RoleType)]
                for role in roles:
                    msgs = self.env.get_messages_for_role(role)
                    if not msgs:
                        if self.tracer:
                            self.tracer.log("ORCH", "Team", f"No messages for {role.name}")
                        continue
                    for msg in msgs:
                        # guard: skip messages produced by role itself
                        if getattr(msg, "sent_from", None) == role.name:
                            continue
                        resp = await self._safe_act(role, msg)
                        # mark delivered was done by env.get_messages_for_role via delivered set
                        if resp:
                            self.env.publish_message(resp)
                            progress_made = True
                            # If verifier produced PASS, update digest-based streak
                            if isinstance(role, SimpleVerifier) and isinstance(resp.content, str) and "VERIFICATION_RESULT: PASS" in resp.content:
                                # extract digest
                                digest = None
                                for part in (resp.content or "").split("|"):
                                    p = part.strip()
                                    if p.startswith("digest="):
                                        digest = p.split("=",1)[1].strip()
                                        break
                                if digest:
                                    if digest == self._last_digest:
                                        self._streak += 1
                                    else:
                                        self._last_digest = digest
                                        self._streak = 1
                                    self.tracer.log("VERIFIER_STREAK", "Team", f"digest={digest} streak={self._streak}")
                                else:
                                    # No digest -> non-stable pass
                                    self._last_digest = None
                                    self._streak = 1
                            elif isinstance(role, SimpleVerifier):
                                # reset on fail
                                if self._streak > 0:
                                    self.tracer.log("VERIFIER_RESET", "Team", f"resetting streak {self._streak}->0")
                                self._streak = 0

            self.tracer.log("ROUND_END", "Team", f"Round {round_idx} completed progress_made={progress_made} streak={self._streak} history_len={len(self.env.history)}")

            # Termination: require required_stable_passes consecutive identical verification digests
            if self._streak >= self.required_stable_passes:
                self.tracer.log("TEAM_EARLY_STOP", "Team", f"Verification stable for {self._streak} passes; stopping early")
                break

            # If no progress, nudge coder(s) once and allow immediate reaction
            if not progress_made:
                self.tracer.log("TEAM_NO_PROGRESS", "Team", "No progress this round; nudging coder(s)")
                for r in self.env.roles:
                    if isinstance(r, SimpleCoder):
                        nudge = Message(content=f"Nudge: please refine implementation for: {self.idea}",
                                        instruct_content=self.idea,
                                        role="System",
                                        sent_from="Orchestrator",
                                        cause_by="Nudge",
                                        send_to={r.name})
                        self.env.publish_message(nudge)
                        resp = await self._safe_act(r, nudge)
                        if resp:
                            self.env.publish_message(resp)

        self.tracer.log("TEAM_END", "Team", "Project completed")
        self.tracer.log("SUMMARY", "Team", f"Rounds executed={round_idx} messages={len(self.env.history)} stable_streak={self._streak}")
